website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe construction site radio that lets you instantly stream music from any Bluetooth-enabled device.
pros: Equalizer feature for consistent volume and sound quality from both speakers
12 presets, and you can easily program your favorite radio stations
Runs on Lithium-ion batteries or AC adapter
cons: Thin power cord tends to snap easily

customer_reviews.title: Radio good/junk cord
customer_reviews.text: I work in a noisy factory and while this isn't the loudest radio, it does a fairly decent job. My biggest complaint (like in other reviews) is the cord. I've had the radio for approximately 2 months and the cord is junk!! I would expect a job site radio to have a more durable cord.
customer_reviews.author: Xparamed

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the sound is fairly good for the size and the radio reception is fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly decent. I have used it with the 20v 2.0 amp batteries at a fairly loud level and the batteries have lasted a decent amount of time, about 6 hours. Here's my issue; the bluetooth is a little sketchy. The music sometimes is intermittent, skips etc. Also I have actually lost bluetooth connectivity for no apparent reason. Otherwise the sound is fairly good for the size and the radio reception is fairly decent, and no I'm not right next to radio towers, about 50 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: jim stenson

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great - well made
customer_reviews.text: Sounds better than I expected - very well made and handy
customer_reviews.author: codawson

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: Radio blew a speaker fairly young. This cost it one star. (Bass was turned up on equalizer and a co worker turned it up to max. Would think the speakers would handle the amplifier installed) Kinda hard to set the preset radio stations. Good sound, not concert quality but really good stereo sound. Works excellent for talk radio/sports announcers. Bluetooth works well. Never used the auxiliary input. Tough, heavy duty plastic frame. Been dropped a couple times. Like the fact it uses the Porter Cable rechargeable batteries or 110 voltage. I would buy again but I wouldn’t want to spend over $60
customer_reviews.author: rhero

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio! It's easy to commute with. Bought it as a gift for my fiancee and he loves it. He takes it back and forth from work to his workshop at home. He plays his favorite music seamlessly. I made him a very happy birthday boy, for a very decent price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay for the price. Some limited control over bass and treble but no much. Speakers are small and tinny. Didn't come with battery so I can't rate that. I have an old P&C battery pack but the plug in that came with the box won't charge the battery. I don't know what "sheerness" means so I didn't rate that. Also, it would be nice if it had a SIM card slot so I can plug a card in without having to pair my phone or plug the aux in every time I use the box.
customer_reviews.author: B. Charley

customer_reviews.title: Keep it close!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good radio for listening to in a small space like a small garage or a quiet construction job....lol. Not much on any bass and the volume isnt the best. Other than that it is a nice radio.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Radio sounds great and holds good charge all day!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say for $60 this was a steal, probably the best radio with all these features that anyone could ask for from an outside work radio. It is a lot smaller than you would think from the pictures, but that has nothing to do with the sound coming from this radio. I use the iPhone and I can be about 20 feet away from the radio and stream music to the unit. Huge upgrade from Ridgid. Great buy for me! Love it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good investment - okay design
customer_reviews.text: Don’t throw away your older “dead” porter cable batteries!!! I was able to use my old batteries that wouldn’t power the tools anymore for this radio, and still get a day or so of radio use out of them. Biggest issue: Not a huge problem, but I wish I could see the buttons at night.. unfortunately the buttons are not illuminated. Get your tape measure out, the stereo was a tad smaller than I thought it would be, but it’s not s major issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable delivers!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio Porter Cable delivers great sound great value! Batter about 10 hours put on some classic rock sounds great. Also I was expecting the post office go deliver was not was actually Amazon very quick and fast kept me updated and professional!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very little! Tiny little! When you open the box you will not expect how little it is in comparison to the picture you see and the price. But you will agree in the end its worth it. I was surprised at the size.
customer_reviews.author: RjVZ

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it! Great buy :) Cute little guy for being so loud!
customer_reviews.text: Very great! Sound quality very loud for being such a little guy! Very cool and great surprise to my hubby. He loves it for his work site and so do his co-workers they all get to jam while working and can hear the music over the power tools! Comes with an ability to plug in or use Porter-Cable battery. He loves the fact that he can use his one of his Porter-Cable batteries to operate it while the work site has no power ! Great addition to his expanding Porter-Cable set :)
customer_reviews.author: Kenna-Rae

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the man in your life.....he will thank you
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing little product. I bought for my fiancé for Father’s Day, and it was everything he was hoping for in a convenient package. It’s compact so he can use it on the job without taking up tons of space. It’s also easy to transport. The sound quality is very nice for the size as well, and the Bluetooth is super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Was smaller than I expected, but hubby loves it and it's for him. Sound is surprisingly good for something so small. Runs off the cord or his battery for his porter cable drill fits too.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaChristine

customer_reviews.title: One nice radio.
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio, the sound is awesome. Plus you can charge batteries and it is Bluetooth compatible.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good little speaker with a clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Good little speaker with a clear sound. Don't expect it to be as loud as some others, but it runs for hours off a full battery
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Powercord is fine for DIY person or a garage/workshop
customer_reviews.text: I waited to order this for a while based on the reviews of the power cord. I would not bring it to a daily job site for work, but is great for your personal workshop, tractor, travel trailer ect. Very happy with the quality and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my son was looking for. This is a great quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio that packs a punch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my shop, and it hasn’t let me down. I’m surprised by the sound output, given that it is such a small radio. Highly recommend for any mechanic or workshop owner. Syncs to my iPhone flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty good. Don’t unplug or shut off AC power, the clock will have to be reset.
customer_reviews.author: CaptJoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio for price
customer_reviews.text: had to add a handle to top to make it more useable. Wish it had a charger in it. Works better plugged in to 110V an with battery.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value and rugged
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchase because my original was stolen. It’s a great radio for when I’m working construction. Signal is good and the Bluetooth worked good. This isn’t a Bose speaker, but for the price, it sounds better then what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hillmann

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio,
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my husband. He really likes the sound quality and protection from damage features. Also, he has Porter-Cable tools so the batteries are interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy1965

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised the battery wasn’t included. Add doesn’t say not included
customer_reviews.author: Alice C. Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little radio is awesome. I just wish The porter cable batteries were better
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is bad ass! Good quality, and it's perfect for my garag.
customer_reviews.author: Gasman

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little radio perfect for at work on production line plenty loud enough too
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Shop radio
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, works for me, wish it had USB input
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this radio. Takes it with him on jobs and can use his batteries from his drill.
customer_reviews.author: Girl514

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, recipient was really pleased with everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I like the Bluetooth feature. Being able to use the Porter cable batteries is a huge convenience
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio!! Really pleased with it. Would buy again if anything would happen to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Good little shop radio
customer_reviews.text: Good little radio. Easy to connect to, very loud, and feels well built for the low price. I use it in my garage, and, while it's not loud enough to overwhelm my cabinet saw, it is pretty dang loud for such a little radio.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small radio
customer_reviews.text: My 1.4ah batteries last 3-4 days in this radio. Sounds great for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: It’s small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I was expecting. But it does fit nicely in my work locker. After a week I think I blew a speaker. Not the best for a large or noisy environment. Bluetooth volume seems less than the radio
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!
customer_reviews.text: Loud, and lasts about 5 hours off of one of the original 20v batteries. Dropped off of a single story roof, and survived. Haven't used the plug in cord it comes with but the batteries work great
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wife to bring with her to work everyday
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great little radio
customer_reviews.text: The one star rating is because inside my husbands shop there is absolute no fm reception. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Olson

customer_reviews.title: Limited Bluetooth range and power but a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done.But the Bluetooth doesn't reach far and the sound is limited by the small size.Other than that sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using daily working on the house and helps keep me moving! Sound is great and battery lasts hours!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Protzman

customer_reviews.title: Radio
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, it's not very big so it doesn't take u pol much room . Does not charge batteries either but I didn't think it did so no lose.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Sweet tunes!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Amazing sound for it's size. I like it so much I bought another one for my other building.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, rugged device for contractors, camping or sports events!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Radio and the spare battery oak! Used for camping!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall C. Oneal

customer_reviews.title: the best!!
customer_reviews.text: love this speaker i used it almost everyday great sound and time life battery!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Solid and durable but sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Convenient size. Has good sound. Bluetooth connection is strong and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Fur Bearincritter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great people to do business with I will be back 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Small but good...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice LITTLE radio/music player. It works well, it could be a little louder, but it lasts all day with a fresh 1.5 ah battery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great reception
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son in laws birthday. He was super pleased with it! Said it works great and lasts days in the same battery
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: Good radio for garage
customer_reviews.text: Works well and with small battery it lasts all day. Speakers are great for a small job site or garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great radio I use it in my work shop and in the yard light weight .
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_RETURNEDdsipos

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio only thing is the power cord it’s thin and cheap lasted a week. I use it with battery’s and like it
customer_reviews.author: Ed Zawilla

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Biggies
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful and easy to show him how to work it !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very small. I already own one that uses the 18V and wanted to upgrade to the 20V. It's significantly smaller. Sound quality is poor
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burns

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Loud enough (use it outside)
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Loud enough (use it outside). Bluetooth easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: The preset buttons don't work, nor does the AM. I have to stream my AM talk radio with the bluetooth from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Getz

customer_reviews.title: PORTER-CABLE PCC771B Radio Review
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this radio, it was more than I expected. The sound quality is great. As is the volume level. ( loud ) great for job site and in the garage. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I live way out in the country picks up stations I have never been able to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have it a month and the speakers went out not very happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. Plays it all day and thinks the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had the radio for 1 day and broke, now i cant even return it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The volume just wasn't loud enough to hear in a work site so had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Elia Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a truly portable radio
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, good reception, light weight and the 20V Porter Cable batteries seem to last forever in it. Only downside is that it is aware tool and you must purchase the battery and charger separately. The Porter Cable 20V tools are excellent and I enjoy having this as part of my set.
customer_reviews.author: Blue 911

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, wonderful volume output if working in a shop with other noise.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good radio, not many jobsite radios give you the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good radio, not many jobsite radios give you the Bluetooth and Aux option. Excellent radio reception even in dicey locations.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony AlGhetta

customer_reviews.title: ... need to break in and really test but sounds great, good reception
customer_reviews.text: Just got it so will need to break in and really test but sounds great, good reception, blue tooth works good and seems very strong and compact
customer_reviews.author: Chris manookian

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Very good if you also have porter cable ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Very good if you also have porter cable battery tools. I like the radio function. It also has bluetooth. I use it at work, bbq ,beach and camping its durable and loud. This produst is worth the price 100%
customer_reviews.author: DonJaCo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound to it
customer_reviews.text: Good sound to it. I have it in the workshop but hang it up near the edge of the metal roof which affects all radio's in there.
customer_reviews.author: tony barker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rather small, and has some feedback when you use the bluetooth feature
customer_reviews.author: N.Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Radio With Great Sound..........
customer_reviews.text: Works great at work, in the car and at home! Not the loudest, but exactly what I was looking for. Bluetooth works fantastic with all my devices!
customer_reviews.author: williebthere

customer_reviews.title: Lacking important feature.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 4 stars rather than 5 because (although an AC adapter is included) it cannot charge the 20V power tool batteries.
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio. Sound quality and volume are very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only problem I have with this is that it's much ...
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have with this is that it's much smaller than I needed for work they need a larger version of this!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: If you don't need the clock its a good little radio.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the radio because I already have almost all of the other 20 volt products, the size is small but it's kind of convenient, the Bluetooth works fine within a certain distance, sound is decent, the only downsides are the price could be a little cheaper, and the clock loses time, which I read on a Lowes review, as long as the station memory stays I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sound and Bluetooth is really choppy. Don't go that loud
customer_reviews.author: Austin B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works gets easy to sync with any blue tooth device.
customer_reviews.author: Jchan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it only worked for one week...I shippped it back to Porter Cable for a replacement, the replacement one only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small with big punch!
customer_reviews.text: Clock is totally unreliable. This unit is very small. Speakers are loud enough but distort when loud. Bluetooth is scratchy. but I love it.its perfect for my work place and fits neatly in my toolbox at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Zipper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a toy! It's the size of a $20 Bluetooth speaker... What a shame
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth radio that can take a beating and still sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bluetooth radio for my husband for father's day.....he loves it! It goes with him everywhere even to work! The sound is great for such a small radio. He really likes that he can sync it to his phone and listen to his music. Easy to sync and use. If you're looking for a bluetooth radio that will take a beating (this one goes to construction sites) this is the radio for you!
customer_reviews.author: LoneTreeSoapCo

customer_reviews.title: Yje bluetooth feature is suspect and has bad reception while connected
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the 20v line by porter cable! This however is my least fav!!!! Yje bluetooth feature is suspect and has bad reception while connected! I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: I got it for a good price (around 60) which is why it's 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a good price (around 60) which is why it's 4 stars. For anything close to full price I would say 3 stars. Just not very loud compared to other Bluetooth speakers. And it doesn't charge the battery. But it does have am/fm which most speakers don't these days. For the right price it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste ur money the sound quality is only ok and ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste ur money the sound quality is only ok and it's not water proof got just a little wet and now it doesn't work. Can't do Anything with it but throw it away and the $100 it cost!! Very unhappy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wogie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see display
customer_reviews.text: Really good reception, great sound. Wish it charged the battery when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ford

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE Bluetooth Speaker & Radio (PCC771B)
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1The PORTER-CABLE PCC771B Bluetooth Radio features two high quality speakers that provide stereo performance sound and clear reception; enhance sound with the equalizer feature. The bluetooth compatibility allows users to wirelessly stream music from any smart device. AM/FM/AUX 12 presets allows users to select and save favorite stations, and the AUX mode plays MP3 from media device. This radio is a durable and compact unit that withstands jobsite elements and is easy to store or move around your jobsite. It operates on 20V Max Lithium ion batteries plus alternate power source with an AC adaptor.
feature_bullets: Two high quality speakers with an equalizer feature
Bluetooth compatibility to stream music from any smart device
AM/FM/AUX - 12 presets to save favorite radio stations, and AUX mode allows MP3 play

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars370 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
